name: Firefox Devtools Breadcrums back beside top search
description:
This Script return the "breadcrumbs" bar in the Firefox Devtools where it's always been
before Firefox 48.

Crazy Mozilla move things around just for the sake of changing it and this change make no sense
at all since it just remove space in the Devtools and make it look more cramped.
